page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED.
page.content: It took about half an hour to get to Sherborne. First we parked the car on the side of the road. Mum's first customer was an old lady of 87 she was having a perm that took Mum 2 hours. We drove to Mr and Mrs Knight and parked in the driveway.Mum and I took the hairdressing kit into the house. Mum started Mrs Knight's hair and Mr Knight took me round his garden.He cut some leaves off some plants for me so that I can grow some lovely flowers like he has. Every time I go down there I help him do something.We have some shrubs in our garden called after our family, mine is a pink azalea.Mr Knight's garden is well worth going to see. We left about 1.15 as we had to be at the Countess's at 2.0 Mum was in charge of the sponsored swimming for the Brownies.I swam as well I was
